long_description: Aerodynamic and whisper quiet, the compact Whispbar Flush Bars are a virtually silent roof rack system. 6 lengths: S4 = 900mm/35.4 in.; S5 = 950 mm/37.4 in.; S6 = 1,000 mm/39.37 in.; S7 = 1,050 mm/41.34 in.; S8 = 1,100 mm/43.31 in.; S25 = 950mm/37.4 in. and 1,000 mm/39.37 in. Vehicle-specific Whispbar SmartFoot fitting kit (sold separately) is required for installation; refer to Rack Fitting Guide to find your kit. Whispbar crossbars are designed with an aerofoil shape (think airplane wing) that allows air to pass over with less resistance, reducing drag and increasing fuel efficiency. Aerodynamic bar profile reduces wind noise and drag up to 70% less than other roof racks. Includes bars, integrated towers and mounting hardware. Whispbar accommodates most universal attachments and t-slot attachments for bike, water, snow and cargo accessories. Locks and 2 SKS keys are included. Whispbars Flush Bars have a maximum hauling load of 165.35 lbs./75kg. Please use the Yakima fit guide to select proper Whispbar lengths for your vehicle.
short_description: Aerodynamic and whisper quiet, the compact Whispbar Flush Bars are a virtually silent roof rack system.
